description:

Leather frontal part is high: 13 cm - 5"

This is a leather belt,I have made it in black, but if you desire I can offer it in brown and in grey too.
It is all made of pure original italian soft leather. The belt is entirely made in calfskin and has an elastic to fits better.
The belt is closed on the back so when you look at it on the front ,you'll see only the rouche decoration.The Studs gives a precious look, they sparkle as jewels.
The belt is regulable so you tighten the lenght and can wear it on your waist, or enlarge and put it on your hips.
Half part of the belt is made of elastic so it will perfectly adapt to your shapes.

--------SHIPMENT :---------
THE BELT IS MADE TO ORDER AND WILL BE SHIPPED IN 24 HOURS AFTER RECEIVING THE PAYMENT.
I offer discounted rated for fast shipment. convo me for a quotation
Inside the package you will receive the belt in a fabric bag, with tag
----------- CARE : ---------
Calfskin is a very strong leather, moreover it is chemically treated to resist to most of all stain. For not oily stains I usually rub a clean cloth with water.Anyway in case you will stain your belt convo me and I will tell you what you can do to remove it. But remember leather is delicate, even calfskin, so watch yourself with a leather garnment , you can't just put in your wash machine like a normal shirt.

Ask me for any further information.
thank you for watching!
